CONVERSATION GROUP:
BK ORiginal Line: I knew you would come. Foolish mortal clay with dreams of grandeur. You are here in time to witness my ascension. Now is when I take my rightful place as a demon lord!

BK as per WOTC demon lord not capitalized
BK Original line: You will fall to your knees as I return to the Abyss as a god!
BK You're not a god yet, and we intend to keep it that way.
We seem to be pretty good at stopping grand schemes.

BK Original: And yet the Moontear is in my possession, and you have come to sacrifice yourselves at my hand.
Caps on Moontear
BK We're done being your pawns! Time to end this game!
Servant! Is the ritual ready yet?!
BK Yes, my lord. The Moontear is fully prepared. All the power within is yours for the taking.
Despair mortals! For a god is about to be born in your midst!
BK Enough of this! I grow weary from swatting at flies.
No! I will not be defeated! My power is infinite!
